law.catch_line: Supervision of winding up and liquidation.

text.section: Subject to KRS 386A.8-030(3), after dissolution of a statutory trust, the trustee or trustees shall wind up the trustâ€™s activities.

The appropriate court may order judicial supervision of the winding up of a statutory trust, including the appointment of a person to wind up the trustâ€™s activities:
On application of a beneficial owner, if the applicant establishes good cause; or
In connection with a proceeding under KRS 386A.8-030.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 68, effective July 12, 2012.
